bug.author: QuellaZhang
bug.summary: MLPACK build failed on MSVC + permissive- on windows
bug.description:
MLPACK failed when build with /permissive- by msvc on Windows, I use latset version <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/commit/dabd108b38c8f58648c0b137dd60c8e9cf51f243>dabd108</denchmark-link> on master branch. Could you please help look at this? You can repro this issue as the steps below:
git clone https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack D:\MLPACK\src it dependent armadillo and OpenBlas, put them to D:\MLPACK\external\ open a VS 2017 amd64 command prompt as admin and browse to D:\MLPACK set CL=/permissive- mkdir build_x64 && pushd build_x64 cmake -G "Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64" -DBLAS_LIBRARY=%cd%..\external\OpenBLAS.0.2.14.1\lib\native\lib\x64\libopenblas.dll.a -DLAPACK_LIBRARY=%cd%..\external\OpenBLAS.0.2.14.1\lib\native\lib\x64\libopenblas.dll.a -DARMADILLO_INCLUDE_DIR=%cd%..\external\armadillo-9.200.4\include -DARMADILLO_LIBRARY=%cd%..\external\armadillo-9.200.4\lib\armadillo.lib -DBOOST_INCLUDEDIR=C:\boost_1_67_0\x64 -DBOOST_LIBRARYDIR=C:\boost_1_67_0\x64\lib64-msvc-14.1 -DDEBUG=OFF -DPROFILE=OFF ..\src msbuild /m /p:Configuration=Release;Platform=x64 mlpack.sln /t:Rebuild
Failures: cl : Command line error D8021 : invalid numeric argument '/Wno-unknown-pragmas'
